summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2912, for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northwest, from East 39th Street to East 41st Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewers and side sewers with such appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 35228 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
